nodes.description: A brave warrior on a quest to save the kingdom.
An evil sorcerer bent on world domination.
A fearsome dragon guarding an ancient treasure.
The shining seat of power in the kingdom.
The ominous lair of Malakar the Dark.
A legendary sword of immense power.
Defeat the evil sorcerer Malakar and save the kingdom.
The final confrontation between Aric and Malakar.
A noble order of knights sworn to protect the kingdom.
